roleset.name: wish, desire
roleset.note: WISH-V NOTES: Based on financial subcorpus. Member of Vncls wish-62, long-32.2-1. Comparison with 'want'. Or not. (from wish.01-v)
WISH-N NOTES: Added by Julia based on wish-v.01. Corresponds to Vncls wish-62, long-32.2-1. (from wish.01-n)

example.name: rarely with benefactive
example.text: Industry executives are wishing Mr. Achenbaum well.

example.name: sentential wish
example.text: A reinsurance company effectively insures insurance companies that *trace* wish to spread the risk of a particular policy.
example.arg: to spread the risk of a particular policy

example.name: with arg0
example.text: will she truly be an independent voice on the Supreme Court not just doing George W Bush 's wishes

example.name: args 0 and 1
example.text: With applause and well wishes from family and friends , Rick is now well on his way .

example.name: all args
example.text: Chen said he would like to visit the west African state and extended his wish of success for President Compaore's party.
